import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function AdsPage() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [selectedTab, setSelectedTab] = useState('campaigns'); const [campaigns] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Summer Sale Campaign', status: 'Active', platform: 'Google Ads', budget: '$500', clicks: '1,234', impressions: '15,678', ctr: '7.87%' }, { id: 2, name: 'Product Launch', status: 'Paused', platform: 'Facebook Ads', budget: '$300', clicks: '892', impressions: '12,456', ctr: '7.16%' } ]); const adPlatforms = [ { name: 'Google Ads', icon: ( ), color: '#4285F4' }, { name: 'Facebook Ads', icon: ( ), color: '#1877F2' }, { name: 'LinkedIn Ads', icon: ( ), color: '#0A66C2' } ]; return (

Campaign Automation

Manage and optimize your advertising campaigns

{selectedTab === 'campaigns' && (

Your Active Campaigns

{campaigns.map((campaign) => (

{campaign.name}

{campaign.status}
{campaign.platform}
{campaign.budget}
{campaign.clicks}
{campaign.impressions}
{campaign.ctr}
))}
)} {selectedTab === 'platforms' && (

Advertising Platforms

Connect and manage your advertising accounts

{adPlatforms.map((platform, index) => (
{platform.icon}

{platform.name}

))}
)} {selectedTab === 'analytics' && (

Campaign Analytics

Track performance and optimize your campaigns

Total Impressions

28,134
+12.5%

Total Clicks

2,126
+8.3%

Average CTR

7.55%
+2.1%

Total Spend

$800
-5.2%

Performance Over Time

📈 Chart visualization would go here

Integration with analytics APIs coming soon

)}
); } export default AdsPage;
